parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to detach all tags. This parameter takes effect only when the TagKey.N parameter is not specified. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Default value: false.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~143074~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the cluster. Set the value to `ALIYUN::ADB::CLUSTER`.
